page.title: 04A CHESTERTON HOUSEWIFE
page.content: We live in a modern 4 bedroomed house on the edge of town.We get up at 7.30 and have breakfast of cereal,wholemeal bread,milk,some times fried bacon.We read the Telegraph and listen to the Today programme on Radio 4.My husband gets ready for work at the local comprehensive where he teaches Maths, our son of 12 attends the same school. Our daughter of 9 goes to the nearby primary.I carry on with the daily chores.At 9.30 I leave for the Sports Centre to play badminton or do gym.At 12 I return to carry on with the jobs and have lunch.While I clean house I listen to Woman's Hour or a Concert. The evening meal is usually relaxed & as varied as possible,meat,vegetables, fruit but also vegetarian for me.After homework the children watch their programmes,have a bath and go to bed. My husband works until 9 & then to bed
